summary:
The Security Council,
Recalling resolutions 731 (1992), 748 (1992), 883 (1993) and 1192 (1998) on destruction of Pan Am flight 103 and Union de transports aeriens flight 772,
Recalling President's statement of 8 April 1999 (S/PRST/1999/10),
Welcoming letters from Libyan Arab Jamahiriya (S/2003/818), UK and US (S/2003/819) of 15 August 2003,
Acting under Chapter VII of UN Charter,
1. Decides to lift measures set forth in resolutions 748 (1992) and 883 (1993) with immediate effect;
2. Decides to dissolve Committee established by resolution 748 (1992);
3. Decides it has concluded consideration of item “Letters dated 20 and 23 December 1991” and removes it from list of matters.
